name: MusterMark
description:
MusterMark is an arcade-style puzzle game for mouse & keyboard.

A free demo is available for Windows and Linux.

How to Play
  • pieces will spawn continuously 
  • left-click on any piece to select it
  • use W , E , A , S , D , Z , X  keys (or local equivalents on non-English keyboards) to control the selected piece
  • connect three tiles of different color to clear them
  • game ends when a spawning piece is blocked
Requirements
  • OS: Windows or Linux (64-bit)
  • OpenGl 4.3 compatible GPU
Acknowledgments
  • using Xolonium-Font by Severin Meyer
